content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price we have in mind is $1,500 per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1500 Euro, but I am wondering if there is any discount I can get?

Also, I want to make sure that the apartment is clean and in good condition before signing the lease agreement.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Dear Maria, I'm glad you agreed to the rental price of 1,500 Euros. As for your question about a discount, unfortunately, we cannot offer any additional discounts at this time. However, we can assure you that the apartment is in excellent condition and has been recently renovated. Before signing the lease agreement, you are welcome to have a professional cleaning service come in to inspect the apartment and make any necessary adjustments. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can I have a look at the lease agreement before signing it?

Also, I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition before signing the lease agreement.

Finally, is there any possibility of me moving in before the end of the month?

Thanks for your help.

Best regards,
Maria Mamani
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I understand that you would like to review the lease agreement before signing it. We would be happy to provide you with a copy of the agreement for your review.

Regarding the condition of the apartment, we would like to assure you that it is in excellent condition and has been recently renovated. If you would like to have a professional cleaning service come in to inspect the apartment and make any necessary adjustments, we can arrange that for you.

As for your question about moving in before the end of the month, unfortunately, it is not possible for you to move in before the end of the month as the lease agreement has not yet been signed. However, we can work with you to try to expedite the process as much as possible.

Thank you for your understanding, and please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
